summary: "The Lighthouse" is a 2019 black-and-white film directed by Robert Eggers. It stars Willem Dafoe and Robert Pattinson as lighthouse keepers stranded on a remote New England island in the 1800s. The movie is hard to categorizeâ€”it's been called a horror film, thriller, and character study. Inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's work and a real-life lighthouse accident, the film was shot in Canada and drew from old photography and art for its look. It received critical praise and was nominated for awards, including Best Cinematography at the Academy Awards.
title: The Lighthouse (2019 film)
